description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named FeedbackController, which provides endpoints for managing feedback entities in an airport passenger service platform. It includes methods to list, retrieve, create, and delete feedback entries, interacting with a FeedbackRepository and handling request validation, response status codes, and path/query parameters.

classes.name: FeedbackController
classes.description: A REST controller for managing feedback entities, providing endpoints to list, retrieve, create, and delete feedback records.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list feedback. Can filter by passengerId or facilityId.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific feedback entry by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new feedback entry with validation.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a feedback entry by its ID.
